summary.span: 表示 对象的有序集合。

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的所有对象 都具有一个 名为的 。All objects that derive from have an named . 派生自的所有对象 都具有一个 名为的 。All objects that derive from have an named . 但是，如果在中设置这些集合 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，则集合中的项必须是派生类， 而不是直接 对象。However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. 这是因为不 支持默认公共构造函数。This is because does not support a default public constructor. 因此， 在中设置的项 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 通常是一个 支持默认公共构造函数的派生类，如 或 。Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将其与关联 。The following example creates a and associates it with a . 将 添加到中的 。The is added to the on a .
